title: Achieve a 360-Degree View of the Customer Unit | Salesforce Trailhead

questions.title: 1What underlies the Einstein alert that prompts Dan to discuss Cumulus Wealth Advisory Services with Rachel?

answers.content: A Cumulus Wealth Advisory Services has an ambitious revenue target to hit in the current fiscal year.
B Monthly direct deposits in Rachel's checking account increased significantly.
D Dan recently made several successful referrals to Cumulus Wealth Advisory Services.

wrongAnswers.content: C Dan has a low performance rating and is seeking ways to impress his manager.

correctAnswer.content: B Monthly direct deposits in Rachel's checking account increased significantly.

questions.title: 2How does Alice know to prioritize Rachel when Dan refers her for Cumulus Wealth Advisory Services?

answers.content: A Alice runs a Salesforce report showing that longtime Cumulus customers with more than one product or service are more likely to become wealth clients.
B Alice is trending below her revenue target for the year and is trying to bring on more clients.
C Alice can see that Dan's past referrals converted to wealth clients at a higher than average rate.

questions.title: 3How does Alice decide to contact Rachel after her initial email fails to generate a response?

answers.content: A Alice discovers that Rachel's husband, Miguel, is already a client, and she asks him if he's interested in joint wealth planning.
B Alice uses LiveMessage to text message Rachel a special offer for discounted wealth management services.
D Alice buys a list from a local publisher that includes Rachel's mailing address, and she sends her a direct mailer.

wrongAnswers.content: C Alice uses Advertising Studio to deliver ads to Rachel in her social media feeds.

correctAnswer.content: A Alice discovers that Rachel's husband, Miguel, is already a client, and she asks him if he's interested in joint wealth planning.
